title: Rajasthan Schools in Khanua amid cold weather, Immediate Closure Announced
text: Khanua Rajasthan School Updates: The Chief Block Education Officer Naresh Sharma took a surprise inspection visit to the private schools in the area of gram panchayat Khanua, Rajasthan. Get Rajasthan 2024 latest news and updates In this surprise visit, Naresh Sharma discovered that some schools in the areas of Khanua were still conducting classes in the school in cold weather. UPES Dehradun Application Forms Released. [Apply Now!](https://admissions.upes.ac.in/courses/upes-brand.aspx?utm_source=sarvgyan&utm_medium=jbt_link&utm_campaign=2024) On 23 December 2023, the government announced the [Rajasthan school holidays](https://news.sarvgyan.com/rbse-announces-rajasthan-winter-vacations-for-session-2023-24-from-dec-25-1002602023/) as the state was experiencing extreme cold waves from 25 December 2023 onwards. Going against the order, some of the private schools held classes for the students. Naresh Sharma took action and ordered to immediate shutdown of the schools, as per Dainik Bhaskar’s report. Rajasthan School Holidays As per the education officer’s order, the schools in Rajasthan have been announced holiday for 13 days. The schools will remain closed from 25 December 2023 to 5 January 2024. However, if the temperature in the state continues to drop by 5 January 2024 the government may extend the school holidays. The Uttar Pradesh District Magistrate Archana Verma has also announced that the schools in UP will remain closed on 28 and 29 December 2023 due to thick fog. Also, the [school timings](https://news.sarvgyan.com/uttar-pradesh-school-timings-changed-in-various-districts-of-up-due-to-cold-weather-and-dense-fog-1027602023/) in Uttar Pradesh have been revised by the government, as per the revised schedule the classes for grades 1 to 8 will now be conducted from 10:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. If you have any queries related to Rajasthan’s school holidays, feel free to ask by leaving a comment in the comment section provided below. FAQs Ans- Yes, the chief block education minister took immediate action and shut down the schools in Khanua Rajasthan. Ans- The chief block education minister Naresh Sharma shut down the schools in Khanua due to cold weather. Ans- If the temperature steadily decreases till 5 January the Rajasthan government may decide to extend the school holidays, however, there is no official notice yet. Ans- The Rajasthan schools are closed as the state is experiencing extreme cold waves. Ans- The Rajasthan schools will reopen on 6 January 2024.
